SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into rc_order_operation (ORDER_ID, OPERATION_TYPE, MEMBER_ID, OPERATION_MEMO, OPERATION_TIME) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{operationType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operationMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update rc_order_operation
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OPERATION_TYPE = #{operationType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
OPERATION_MEMO = #{operationMemo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATION_TIME = #{operationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ORDER_OPERATION_ID = #{orderOperationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
